lenders.name: Blake
lenders.occupation: Human Rights Activist and WFP Committee Leader
lenders.loan_because: **Good Thoughts**Good Words**Good Deeds**
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm retired early due to a disability but I do volunteer work for the UN World Food Programme through WFP-USA. I'm a WFP Committee Leader in Boston (WFP Committee of Boston on Facebook) and a Human Rights Activist (Board member of Amnesty International's MIT chapter) and a Linux geek at MIT.

Here's a quote that I like from the Iranian poet, Sa'di. It is used to grace the entrance to the Hall of Nations of the UN in New York.

 " When the calamity of time afflicts one limb, the other limbs cannot remain at rest.

If you have no sympathy for the troubles of others, you are not worthy of being called  a human.”

lenders.name: lastguru
lenders.loan_because:
http;//www.lastguru.com
Guru Technologies  was developed by a group of SEO specialists who recognized that there were no practical or affordable internet marketing solutions for small to medium-sized businesses. Many companies do not have the funds to outsource an effective SEO campaign or the resources to bring it in-house. Thus began our mission to create efficient SEO software that was simple, fast, and low-cost.

lenders.name: Lā ilāha illallāh
lenders.loan_because:
I'm an old hippie and I believe in world peace and in sharing.  I believe we must walk our talk.  I believe that there is plenty to go around if we all share.  

as a FMF Corpsman in 'Nam I learned many things: mostly if we don't share food and love and medicine and skills we end up sharing bullets, wounds, pain, skills best used in minin --  and early death from minds that could save the world were they educated.  We are seeing that last part coming true as i write.  We CAN live in peace, if we learn - key word: LEARN.

I believe in God -- no matter by what Name you call Him -- There is No God but God -- and we are all His servants.  

I believe that if we follow a Merciful God we too have a responsibility to show Mercy.  This is an opportunity to walk that talk.  Giving a little reaps far more than we give, always,

I became a teacher to help people learn how to share.  I know this will help -- each tree needs to produce fruit so others might enjoy it -- and a fruit tree needs both a a person so sew it and a person to enjoy it's bounty for it to fulfill it's purpose in it's life.  I hope my seeds grow so there will be more seeds to plant more trees and in such a way, the world will enjoy it's bounty.  

Working in a University and a college taught me the potential power of my students, "Doc" can mean many things, I think they all mean "one who brings help and comfort".  Or should.
lenders.occupational_info:
I became a teacher to help people learn to Love.  Love to learn - Love to share.  I became a teacher to help people learn toleration, and hopefully Understanding, and finally Love.  Some times it's not possible for a student to get beyond Toleration -- but that is better than where they started.  Some even learn how to Love.  I am still learning that part.  But then, it's the most difficult part.  

Right now I help take care of old or abused Northern Sled dogs -- often they are both.  They help me learn about Love.  They are an important part of my life and teach me a lot, and often what they teach me, I can teach others.  Want to learn about people, own a cat -- want to learn to Love - live with Northern Sled Dogs.  

I joined because I helped a student - and that student grew and prospered, and I helped others who grew and graduated and helped others, many became friends and years later one of the first, Sandy, showed me this organization, which helps me - and her - and so we both grow in an ever-increasing spiral.  Thank you my friend.  May our spirals grow ever larger.

And may the world enjoy itself and it's people enjoy the Plenty that God provides for all of us.  Thank you my Friend.

lenders.name: Johanna
lenders.loan_because: I am a single mother who takes care of my son as well as my mother who is sick and cant work. I try very hard to make it in my country, i am a very smart woman, but the oportunities have not been given to me. PLease help me get my family a better life. please i beg you help get me started in my bussines of selling make up so that i can do that as a part time job and continue working for my son and my mother who has given all to me and now she needs me to take care of her. My mother unfortunaly when she was young had a car accident which had come to produce her in her brian a bloud clough that is affecting her daily life.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is all about the joy of teaching, i am a english teacher in my country. I love seeing a kid read their first sentence and how sweet they are. i love my job but in my country it is a very under paid profession
